entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as losing color on his face and having black eyes that widened when the snake's fangs pierced his neck.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as coldly saying 'I regret it' after killing Snape.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: The snake's fangs pierced Snape's neck.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: Voldemort used the Elder Wand to take charge and make it do his full bidding.

relationships.description: Voldemort killed Snape with the snake's fangs.
Voldemort used the Elder Wand to take charge and make it do his full bidding.
